author: Haley Henschel
title: Coronavirus has changed everything. These are the essentials you need for this new 'normal.'
description: Note: 100% of the affiliate commission we earn from this post will be donated to NY Presbyterian and Feeding America to support those most affected by coronavirus. Forget the lamb — March went in like a lion and out like a raging, toilet paper-hoarding chimer…
